au.aklein.metajava

Class ClassElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.aklein.metajava.ClassElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Element

    public final class ClassElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements Element
    An object representing a type Element (class/interface/enum) inside a class file.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ClassElement.ClassElementBuilder
      Builder class used to construct ClassElement objects from class file data

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Description copied from interface: Element
        Get the name of the element being represented. As this is based off the au.aklein.metajava.internal representation of the element's binary name, names are delimited by forward slashes (/) instead of periods as described in the JLS.
        Specified by:
        getName in interface Element
        Returns:
        A string containing the element's name
